item.title: T.预测日元震荡的 T Rowe 经理预见到另一次震荡即将来临
item.description: 阿里夫-侯赛因（Arif Husain）说，去年他很早就对日本利率上升敲响了警钟，并将其描述为 "金融业的圣安德烈亚斯断层"。【原文：Arif Husain says he was early in sounding the alarm on Japan’s rising interest rates last year, which he described as the “San Andreas fault of finance.”】

item.title: Pimco 认为日本央行最快将于 1 月加息，并看好长期债券
item.description: Pimco Japan Ltd. 预计日本央行最早将于 1 月份再次加息，并准备积极投资超长期政府债券，因为从价值主张的角度来看，这些债券的水平已经得到修正。【原文：Pimco Japan Ltd. expects the Bank of Japan to raise rates again as early as January and is ready to actively invest in ultra long-term government bonds, which have seen their level corrected from a value proposition standpoint.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。交易员为九月的波动做好准备，新兴市场面临投资者的谨慎，金砖国家集团面临扩张的前景。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. Traders brace for September volatility, emerging markets confront investor caution and the BRICS group faces the prospect of expansion. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Kristine Aquino】

item.title: 利比亚忧虑与中国经济低迷交织，石油价格趋于稳定
item.description: 投资者在权衡利比亚产量受阻和对中国经济疲软前景的担忧后，石油价格趋于稳定。【原文：Oil steadied as investors weighed disruptions to Libyan output against concerns over the outlook for China’s weakening economy.】

item.title: 英国购物者警惕 "双底通缩
item.description: 英国的消费者注意到了 "双倍缩水 "现象，即巧克力和薯片等产品的体积缩小了数倍，因为供应商试图保护他们的利润。【原文：Consumers in the UK are noticing “double dip shrinkflation” where products such as chocolate and crisps have reduced in size multiple times as suppliers try to protect their profits.】

item.title: 习近平希望从非洲债务交易中获得更大回报、更少麻烦
item.description:
十年来，中国不断增加的贷款助长了非洲国家的违约行为，如今，中国政府提出了一项新建议：商业贷款可为中国带来更好的回报

。【原文：

After a decade of surging Chinese lending helped push African countries toward default, Beijing has a new proposal: commercial loans that could generate better returns for China

】

item.title: 中国消费下滑，李嘉诚的奢侈品购物中心空空如也
item.description:
香港曾经是中国人购买名牌手袋和手表的最大受益者。随着中国购物者崇尚节俭，香港购物区的空洞化和零售额的下降正向全球奢侈品牌发出警告。【原文：

Hong Kong was once the biggest beneficiary from China’s splurging on designer handbags and watches. The city’s hollowed out shopping districts and falling retail sales are now a warning to global luxury brands as Chinese shoppers embrace frugality. 

】

item.title: 中国忧虑加剧，亚洲股市看似平稳：市场综述
item.description: 周二，亚洲股市开盘平稳，投资者对中国经济困境的担忧日益加剧。【原文：Asian stocks were poised for a steady open Tuesday, with investors holding their nerve as concerns mount over China’s economic woes.】

item.title: 阿根廷将金条运往国外进行财务认证
item.description: 据直接了解此事的人士称，阿根廷央行最近几周将其部分黄金储备送往国外进行金融用途验证，此举可能会给该国带来一些急需的灵活性。【原文：Argentina’s central bank sent part of its gold reserves abroad in recent weeks to be validated for financial use, a move that could give the country some much-needed flexibility, according to people with direct knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 在 REA 引起兴趣后，Rightmove 与瑞银和摩根士丹利合作
item.description: 据知情人士透露，英国市场份额最大的房地产门户网站 Rightmove Plc 正在与瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）和摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）合作，以应对澳大利亚 REA 集团有限公司主动提出的收购意向。【原文：Rightmove Plc, the UK’s biggest property portal by market share, is working with UBS Group AG and Morgan Stanley on its response to unsolicited takeover interest from Australia’s REA Group Ltd., people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: Adnoc 准备在两年多的等待后首次登陆债券市场
item.description: 阿布扎比的主要石油生产商 Adnoc 在成立实体进行债券融资两年多后，即将在债券市场上首次亮相。【原文：Abu Dhabi’s main oil producer Adnoc is set to make its bond market debut more than two years after creating an entity to pursue such financing.】

item.title: 动态 "定价如何从飞机票扩展到音乐会
item.description: 任何搜索过航班或优步（Uber）的人都可能习惯于在实际预订之前看到广告价格的变化。但这种 "动态 "定价现象并不广泛适用于音乐会座位。周六，绿洲乐队的粉丝们就发现了这一点，英国摇滚乐队绿洲乐队复出巡演的门票价格在几个小时内上涨了一倍多。英国文化大臣莉萨-南迪（Lisa Nandy）说，"看到普通歌迷被大幅抬高的票价排斥在外，令人沮丧、【原文：Anyone who has searched for a flight or an Uber ride is probably used to seeing the advertised price change before they actually come to book it. But this phenomenon of “dynamic” pricing is not widely known to apply to concert seats. Fans of Oasis discovered it on Saturday, when the cost of tickets for the British rock group’s comeback tour more than doubled in the space of a few hours. UK Culture Secretary Lisa Nandy said it was “depressing to see vastly inflated prices excluding ordinary fans,】

item.title: 裂痕扩大，利比亚宣布关键油田不可抗力
item.description: 利比亚国家石油公司宣布，由于欧佩克（OPEC）成员国内部权力斗争引发的停产范围不断扩大，关键油田El-Feel面临不可抗力。【原文：Libya’s state oil firm declared force majeure on key field El-Feel amid a widening shutdown of production triggered by a power struggle in the OPEC member.】

item.title: 金丝雀码头正在商谈最高达 6.03 亿英镑的债务再融资事宜
item.description: 金丝雀码头集团正在与贷方谈判，为高达 6.03 亿英镑（7.93 亿美元）的垃圾债券再融资，并提供其购物中心资产作为债务抵押。【原文：Canary Wharf Group is in talks with lenders to refinance up to £603 million ($793 million) in junk bonds and has offered its shopping mall assets as collateral for the debt.】

item.title: 英国税务与海关总署在新规则出台前终止对国际投资协定中零散股票的禁令
item.description: 在英国政府预计于今年晚些时候修改规则之前，英国税务部门已停止执行对持有不足全额股票的免税个人储蓄账户的禁令。【原文：The UK’s tax authority has stopped enforcing a ban on tax-free individual savings accounts holding less than a full share of a stock ahead of an expected rule change by the UK government later this year.】

item.title: 乌克兰希望更改最小货币单位的 "俄罗斯 "名称
item.description: 乌克兰中央银行正在寻求将最小面额的国家货币从 "科比卡"（kopiyka）更名为 "沙赫"（shah），因为它认为这一名称与俄罗斯的 "科佩克"（kopek）过于相似。【原文：Ukraine’s central bank is seeking to rename the smallest denomination of the national currency from the kopiyka to the shah, abandoning a term which it says too strongly resembles Russia’s kopek.】

item.title: 西班牙将于 9 月 4 日宣布新任央行行长人选
item.description: 西班牙将于 9 月 4 日宣布其新任央行行长，结束了数月来对谁将获得这一职位的猜测。【原文：Spain is set to announce its new central bank governor Sept. 4, ending months of speculation over who will get the job.】

item.title: 匈牙利发行武士债券，政府外汇债务接近上限
item.description: 匈牙利自 2022 年以来首次发行日元计价债券，这使匈牙利政府更加接近其对国家外汇计价债务规定的限额。【原文：Hungary is offering yen-denominated bonds for the first time since 2022, pushing the government closer to a limit it has imposed on the state’s foreign exchange-denominated debt.】

item.title: 泽连斯基与荷兰总理一起访问乌克兰扎波罗热
item.description: 乌克兰总统沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基和荷兰首相迪克-肖夫周一访问了南部城市扎波罗热。【原文：Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy and Dutch Prime Minister Dick Schoof visited the southern city of Zaporizhzhia on Monday.】

item.title: 马克龙在决定新总理人选时向前任们提问
item.description: 埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）周一会见了法国前总统尼古拉-萨科齐（Nicolas Sarkozy）和弗朗索瓦-奥朗德（Francois Hollande），他正试图决定任命谁为总理，以结束法国下届政府数周来的不确定性。【原文：Emmanuel Macron met with former French presidents Nicolas Sarkozy and Francois Hollande on Monday as he tries to decide who to name as prime minister in order to end weeks of uncertainty over the country’s next government.】

item.title: 土耳其里拉上涨，央行支持减少外汇需求
item.description: 在土耳其中央银行采取一系列措施抑制不断上升的外汇需求后，土耳其里拉周一上涨。【原文：The Turkish lira gained on Monday after the central bank took a series of steps to tame rising demand for foreign currency.】

item.title: 智利经济活动好于预期，市场期待新一轮降息
item.description: 智利经济在 7 月份以六个月来最快的速度增长，投资者押注央行将恢复逐步降息的周期，以进一步支持经济增长。【原文：Chile’s economy expanded at the fastest pace in six months in July as investors bet the central bank will resume its cycle of gradual interest rate cuts to further support growth.】

item.title: 韦丹塔将支付 9.32 亿美元股息帮助母公司削减债务
item.description: 印度大亨阿尼尔-阿加瓦尔（Anil Agarwal）的韦丹塔有限公司（Vedanta Ltd.）批准了第三批股息分配，这是该公司为改善其负债累累的伦敦矿业母公司的财务状况而做出的最新努力。【原文：Indian tycoon Anil Agarwal’s Vedanta Ltd. approved a third tranche of dividend payout, its latest effort to improve the financial position of its indebted London-based mining parent.】

item.title: 巴西试图在日益增长的支出压力下安抚投资者
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）正在推动增加社会支出，而巴西经济团队却在进入损害控制模式，以安抚投资者并确保政府遵守财政规则。【原文：Brazil’s economic team is going into damage control mode to calm down investors and ensure the government complies with fiscal rules even as President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva pushes for more social spending.】
